purpose: The email announces an extension of deadlines for the Call for Papers for the ICTAC 2025 conference, which will take place in Marrakech, Morocco. It provides details about the conference's focus on theoretical aspects of computing, including various topics of interest. The email also lists important dates for abstract and paper submissions, as well as information about invited speakers and publication opportunities.

infos:
Subject: Deadline Extended: CfP ICTAC'2025
From: SEWORLD Moderator <[log in to unmask]>
Reply-To:SEWORLD Moderator <[log in to unmask]>
Date:Thu, 19 Jun 2025 17:14:46 -0000
Content-Type:text/plain
*International Colloquium on Theoretical Aspects of Computing*
The conference concerns all aspects of theoretical computer science,
* There will be a special issue for selected papers from ICTAC 2025 in
